00005 from datetime import datetime
00006 import time
00007 import htmlentitydefs
00008 import re
00009 import locale
00010 from urllib import quote

00012 
00013 def parse_datetime(string):
00014     # Set locale for date parsing
00015     locale.setlocale(locale.LC_TIME, 'C')
00016 
00017     # We must parse datetime this way to work in python 2.4
00018     date = datetime(*(time.strptime(string, '%a %b %d %H:%M:%S +0000 %Y')[0:6]))
00019 
00020     # Reset locale back to the default setting
00021     locale.setlocale(locale.LC_TIME, '')
00022     return date
00023 
00024 
00025 def parse_html_value(html):
00026 
00027     return html[html.find('>')+1:html.rfind('<')]
00028 
00029 
00030 def parse_a_href(atag):
00031 
00032     start = atag.find('"') + 1
00033     end = atag.find('"', start)
00034     return atag[start:end]
00035 
00036 
00037 def parse_search_datetime(string):
00038     # Set locale for date parsing
00039     locale.setlocale(locale.LC_TIME, 'C')
00040 
00041     # We must parse datetime this way to work in python 2.4
00042     date = datetime(*(time.strptime(string, '%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S +0000')[0:6]))
00043 
00044     # Reset locale back to the default setting
00045     locale.setlocale(locale.LC_TIME, '')
00046     return date

00049 def unescape_html(text):
00050     """Created by Fredrik Lundh (http://effbot.org/zone/re-sub.htm#unescape-html)"""
00051     def fixup(m):
00052         text = m.group(0)
00053         if text[:2] == "&#":
00054             # character reference
00055             try:
00056                 if text[:3] == "&#x":
00057                     return unichr(int(text[3:-1], 16))
00058                 else:
00059                     return unichr(int(text[2:-1]))
00060             except ValueError:
00061                 pass
00062         else:
00063             # named entity
00064             try:
00065                 text = unichr(htmlentitydefs.name2codepoint[text[1:-1]])
00066             except KeyError:
00067                 pass
00068         return text # leave as is
00069     return re.sub("&#?\w+;", fixup, text)
00070

00072 def convert_to_utf8_str(arg):
00073     # written by Michael Norton (http://docondev.blogspot.com/)
00074     if isinstance(arg, unicode):
00075         arg = arg.encode('utf-8')
00076     elif not isinstance(arg, str):
00077         arg = str(arg)
00078     return arg

00082 def import_simplejson():
00083     try:
00084         import simplejson as json
00085     except ImportError:
00086         try:
00087             import json  # Python 2.6+
00088         except ImportError:
00089             try:
00090                 from django.utils import simplejson as json  # Google App Engine
00091             except ImportError:
00092                 raise ImportError, "Can't load a json library"
00093 
00094     return json
00095 
00096 def list_to_csv(item_list):
00097     if item_list:
00098         return ','.join([str(i) for i in item_list])
00099 
00100 def urlencode_noplus(query):
00101     return '&'.join(['%s=%s' % (quote(str(k)), quote(str(v))) \
00102         for k, v in query.iteritems()])
